events.title: AI & Machine Learning Workshop
events.description: A hands-on workshop covering the fundamentals of AI and Machine Learning. Learn from industry experts and get practical experience with real-world projects.

details.overview: This workshop will introduce participants to the core concepts of AI and Machine Learning, including supervised and unsupervised learning, neural networks, and deep learning.
details.whatToBring: Laptop with Python and required libraries installed

events.title: Blockchain Revolution
events.description: Explore the world of blockchain technology, cryptocurrencies, and decentralized applications in this interactive session.

details.overview: This session will cover the fundamentals of blockchain technology, smart contracts, and their real-world applications beyond cryptocurrencies.

events.title: Hackathon 2025
events.description: 24-hour hackathon where participants will build innovative solutions to real-world problems using technology.

details.overview: Join us for an exciting 24-hour coding competition where you'll work in teams to build innovative solutions. The theme will be announced at the event.
details.prerequisites: Open to all students with programming experience
details.whatToBring: Laptop, chargers, and any development tools you prefer
